headline: World's richest people: How AI is shaking up the rankings
summary: The AI stock boom has shaken up the rankings of the world's wealthiest people. Yahoo Finance Markets and Data Editor Jared Blikre takes a look at how AI changed who sits atop the Bloomberg Billionaires Index. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.

headline: AI trade will fracture into winners & losers: Top stock picks
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) will continue to be a key pillar of market gains in 2026, Sevens Report research founder Tom Essaye tells Market Domination host Josh Lipton. Essaye says the AI trade could become more fractured, highlighting which AI stocks he expects to be winners and losers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
